Package com.example.trojanplanner.controller

Class BitmapGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.example.trojanplanner.controller.BitmapGenerator
public class BitmapGenerator extends Object
BitmapGenerator is a utility class that generates a modified version of a default Bitmap by applying a color filter based on the device ID.

The generated color is deterministic, based on the device's unique device ID, ensuring that each device gets a distinct color overlay on the default image.

    Constructs a BitmapGenerator with the specified device ID and default picture.

  • Constructor Details

    • BitmapGenerator

      public BitmapGenerator(String deviceID, android.graphics.Bitmap defaultPicture)
      Constructs a BitmapGenerator with the specified device ID and default picture.
      Parameters:
      deviceID - The unique device ID, used to generate the color filter.
      defaultPicture - The original bitmap that will be modified with a color overlay.

  • Method Details

    • generate

      public android.graphics.Bitmap generate()
      Generates a new bitmap by applying a color filter based on the device ID. The color generated from the device ID is overlaid on top of the default picture.
      Returns:
      A new Bitmap with the color filter applied.
